Name: Mexican Coffee (Hot)
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Place bar spoon in glass. POUR first three ingredients into glass and stir. FLOAT cream.
Review: Tequila's answer to the Irish Coffee. Tip: Lightly whip or simply shake cream in container before pouring over the bowl of a spoon. It also helps if the cream is gently warmed.
Nutrition: One serving of Mexican Coffee (Hot) contains 92 calories
